verses.roman:
prabhu kahe,--bhāla kaile, śāstra-ājñā haya
kṛṣṇera sakala śeṣa bhṛtya āsvādaya

synonyms: prabhu kahe—Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu replied; bhāla kaile—you have spoken correctly; śāstra-ājñā haya—there is such an order in the revealed scripture; kṛṣṇera sakala śeṣa—everything left by Kṛṣṇa; bhṛtya—the servant; āsvādaya—partakes of.
translation: Caitanya Mahāprabhu then said, "Yes, you have spoken correctly. The śāstras enjoin that the devotee can partake of everything left by Kṛṣṇa.
